channel.title: INtopBackup

item.title: 'There were bodies everywhere': Druze residents describe 'bloodbath' in Syrian city Suweida
item.description: One woman tells the BBC she cowered in her home waiting for gunmen to enter and "decide whether we should live or die".

item.title: Colbert says The Late Show will end after 33 years
item.description: Network CBS called it a financial decision tied to the "challenging backdrop in late night" TV.

item.title: Libyan war crimes suspect arrested in Germany under ICC warrant
item.description: Khaled Mohamed Ali El Hishri is accused of murder, torture and rape at a prison in Tripoli.

item.description: U.S. Ambassador Mike Huckabee says Israel should "aggressively investigate the murder" of Saif Musallet in the occupied West Bank.

item.title: Here’s what to know about chronic venous insufficiency
item.description: Swollen legs led to President Donald Trump being diagnosed with what’s called chronic venous insufficiency.
